title: Identifying Initial Transformation Products during Chlorination of the Indole Moiety and Unveiling Their Formation Mechanisms

To identify toxicity drivers within the poorly characterized high-molar-weight disinfection by-products (DBPs), the relatively stable high-yield initial transformation products generated from aromatic amino acids and peptides and humic substances have...
